text: aebadt ma tushrikun birabikum khayr 'am aladhi jaeal lakum al'ard mstqrana wajaeal wstha anharana, wajaeal laha aljibal thwabt, wajaeal bayn albahrayn aledhb walmlh hajzana hataa la yufsd 'ahaduhuma alakhr? amebwd mae allah faeal dhlk hataa tshrkwh maeah fi ebadtkm? bal 'akthar hwla' almushrikin la yaelamun qadr ezmt allh, fahum yushrikun bih tqlydana wzlmana
